modmenu.descriptionTranslation.socksprox:
Use SOCKS proxy to connect to Minecraft server.

Compiled with Java ${compilation_java_version}. (${git_hash})
socksproxyclient.config.general.tooltip: Configuration of SOCKS proxy to use
socksproxyclient.config.general.useProxy: Note: The proxy chain won't be applied to %s multiplayer server(s)
A chain of proxies to use.
Assume you have 3 proxies PA, PB, PC, chain of Client-->PA-->PB-->PC-->Target server, PA being 1st hop, PB 2nd, PC 3rd, put PA on top of this list, PB follows, lastly PC.
socksproxyclient.config.general.proxy.te:
Click this button to test your proxy chain.
Save new settings before click.
HTTP urls used for proxy chain testing
Minecraft server addresses used for proxy chain testing
socksproxyclient.config.server.tooltip: Configuration for proxy chain's scope of effectiveness
socksproxyclient.config.server.minecraft: Proxy DNS lookup for Minecraft servers when using Socks 5
By enabling this, resolution of Minecraft server address will use DNS over HTTPS (DoH). Communications with DoH servers will go through proxy too.
By default, resolution of domain name will first take results from system's host file without further lookup on DNS.
Minecraft client communicates with Mojang's Yggdrasil API service to verify your character, especially upon joining an online server.
Minecraft client communicates with Realms API for Realms service.
Minecraft client may download necessary skin images to render them in game.
Proxy Minecraft server resource pack downloading
Minecraft server may give Minecraft client a HTTP url to download server resource pack from.
Minecraft client automatically fetches Mojang server blocklist to determine which server has been blocked by Mojang.
Proxy DNS lookup for HTTP(S) communications when using Socks 5
By enabling this, resolution of HTTP(s) host will be done by proxy. This applies to DoH. However, if your proxy chain has SOCKS 4 proxy, this setting won't be effective.
socksproxyclient.config.miscellaneous.bu: Show config button in multiplayer screen
